name: Gauss
headline: Lower interest rates on existing credit cards
description:
Gauss allows people with good credit scores to significantly lower interest rates on their credit cards while they keep using them. 

Users connect their credit cards to the mobile app and get a revolving credit line in under 10 minutes. Gauss tracks and automatically pays off any expensive balance on connected cards, saving users thousands of dollars on interest charges and helping them pay off card balances faster and improve credit scores.

founders.name: Alex Matsenov, Founder
founders.description: Alex is the co-founder and CEO of Gauss Money. Alex led credit at Nordea Bank and MDM Bank. He's a 3x founder, 2x YC. Alex has an advance degree in machine learning, was a late stage venture investor in the machine learning space, and is a huge fan of fundamental physics and artificial intelligence research.

founders.name: Abdullo Akhadov, Founder
founders.description: Abdullo is the co-founder and COO of Gauss. He has a 17+ years management tenure in credit risk, compliance, operations, and technology with the largest financial institutions in Europe and the Asia Pacific (JPK, ASEAN, ANZ, Greater China).

# Get the mostout of credit cards
16% APR* on any credit card. Pay off card debt faster and build credit.
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
[App Store](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
[Android](https://gauss.money/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=money.placid.app&hl=en&gl=US&pli=1>)
[Web Sign-up / Login](https://gauss.money/<https:/app.gauss.money>)
[Get the app](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/l2a4/web>)
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
[Google Play](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.onelink.me/tXCz/web>)
Pay off any credit card balance using your low interest credit line from Gauss, both on-demand and automatically. Your cards get lower APR, and you save money on interest charges and pay off balances faster. Keep using your cards and watch your savings go up!
## **Pay off cards faster**
## Earn rewards
Earn Gauss reward points for interacting with the app and paying your cards on time. Use points to pay for Gauss services, reduce APRs, increase credit limit, and get access to premium products1.
Use Gauss Credit Builder to improve credit without even thinking about it. No credit checks. Monthly payments less than $5. Instant initial reporting2.
## Improve Credit Score
Easily learn what it takes to pay off your current balances and see how Gauss can help you pay off faster if you move balances off expensive cards to a low APR Gauss Line. Start with a simple web calculator, then connect your cards to build a personalized plan and budget in the app.
## Follow a payoff plan
[Build a plan](https://gauss.money/<https:/www.gauss.money/credit-card-payoff-calculator>)
## Lower Card Bills.Lower APR.Debt Free Faster.
## No Late Fees.No Transfer Fees.
## $0
Chat with an AI-powered personal assistant to make the perfect decision with your money, every time. Unlock personalized advice for a fraction of the cost of an advisor.
## Personalized financial advice in your pocket
2% returns on your cash. Boost the earnings with timely credit card payments.
## Earn up to 10% returns
Auto invest into diversified ETFs from you card bills without stretching your budget. The more you invest, the lower is your APR with Gauss. Build wealth and break out of debt for good.
## Invest when paying off cards
Coming soon
Coming soon
## Autopay at no cost
Autopay all your credit card bills from a single app. Easily pay above required minimums to pay off balances faster. Prevent late fees and overdraft fees!
## How it works
Connect credit cards via Plaid
Run a soft credit check
Pay off the cards from a low APR Gauss Credit Line
Keep using the cards and repay the line once a month
New balances can be moved to the line automatically.
Earn rewards and better credit terms over time.
## How is Gauss different?
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.money/personalloan>)
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/gauss.money/personalloan>)

[Credit card](https://gauss.money/<https:/www.gauss.money/creditcard>)
[ ](https://gauss.money/<https:/www.gauss.money/creditcard>)
**Is using Gauss safe?**
Gauss meets the highest security and privacy standards of the banking industry and works with the most reliable data providers, like Plaid and Equifax. Your data safety is our top priority, and we use the strongest encryption and anonymize data whenever possible. 
**How does Gauss affect my credit score?**
Gauss improves your credit score in most cases2.Gauss helps prevent late payments and reduces the amount of debt on your cards, reducing their utilization, which may have a positive effect on your credit score. You can improve the score further by paying on time to Gauss.No fees are charged If you're late with your repayments to Gauss, but your credit score will be negatively affected.We also provide a standalone credit builder product if you'd like to improve your credit score without even thinking about it.
I have issues with the app. What do I do?
If your app is loading normally, please reach out through the built-in support chat. If the app is not loading, ping us over the email support@gauss.money. Support team will get back to you as soon as possible.
Who is Gauss good for?
If you ever had unpaid credit card balances and/or actively use multiple credit cards, Gauss is for you! Gauss is great at making your credit cards much cheaper and stress-free.
What are the requirements to use Gauss?
Access to personal finance management tools is available to all Gauss members. Gauss lending products may require soft credit and income checks. Gauss low APR balance transfer line also requires a prime credit score.Some features are only available to customers who have a history with us.
Is Gauss a bank?
No, Gauss is a technology company. We provide our customers with tools and capital to make credit cards cheaper and more convenient.Gauss is built by a team of veterans from global banks like Citi and world-class software engineers. We're on a mission to help people use debt to get better off financially.
How does Gauss make money?
Gauss products and services are available only to Gauss members. Gauss charges a small membership fee, starting at $4.99/month, that can be canceled anytime.APR (which is the same as the interest rate) is charged on balances transferred to Gauss credit line from your credit cards. Only high APR balances that cost you interest are transferred, so you always save money with Gauss.*
**Is Gauss available in my state?**
We're constantly working on expanding Gauss availability. Please download the app to quickly check if Gauss products you're interested in are currently available in your state of residence.
**Is Gauss a debt consolidator?**
Gauss is not a company that takes over your credit card accounts and contacts your creditors. Gauss helps you transfer credit card balances to a low APR credit line to save on interest and pay off faster. We can help you manage card payments, lower your APRs to save you money and accelerate debt payoffs - all from one app.
How do I delete my account?
Go to the Profile tab of the Gauss app and tap on Delete Account. All your data will be deleted within 24 hours, except for the data points required to be retained longer by applicable laws.
Join Now
Scan the QR code to get started now!

* Gauss credit line APR, which is the same as interest rate, is 14%-18%, depending on a number of factors, including credit profile. The rate is variable with prime rate. The majority of credit cards are eligible for the balance transfer if a credit line is approved.For example, if user's APR is 24%, total balance is $10,000 and fixed monthly payments are $300, user's interest expense until full payoff would be $6,644 vs. $2,737 with Gauss. Use [Gauss payoff calculator](https://gauss.money/<https:/www.gauss.money/credit-card-payoff-calculator>) to estimate debt-free dates for your case.1 Earn points every time you take a rewarded action. Find the full list of rewards in the app. You can use your rewards at any time.2 Credit score stability/improvement is not guaranteed. Credit scores are independently determined by credit bureaus, and on-time payment history is only one of many factors that such bureaus consider. Your credit score may be negatively impacted by other financial decisions you make, or by activities or services you engage in with other financial services organizations.[Blog ](https://gauss.money/<https:/blog.gauss.money>)Gauss (Placid Inc.)200 Vesey Street, 24th Floor, New York, NY 10281(877) 909-1559NMLS ID: 2654599Copyright 2025. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Gauss** is a New York-based fintech company on a mission to lower interest rates on existing credit cards. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Gauss offers a unique financial solution that allows individuals with good credit scores to significantly reduce their credit card interest rates while still using their cards.

The process is pretty straightforward: users connect their existing credit cards with the Gauss mobile app, which then provides a revolving line of credit in under 10 minutes. This innovative system tracks users' spending, automatically pays off high-interest balances, and helps them save thousands in interest charges over time. By managing payments smartly and efficiently, Gauss not only expedites the payoff process but also actively works to improve users' credit scores.

Gauss is led by a compact team of 16 employees, with notable support from Michael Seibel as their Group Partner. Their platform is designed for anyone who has unpaid credit card balances or uses multiple credit cards frequently. Essentially, if you’re feeling the weight of high-interest credit card debt, Gauss might be your new best friend.

Users enjoy a range of services through the app, including:

1. **Lower Interest Rates**: Users can transfer high-interest balances to Gauss’s lower APR line (between 14% - 18%).
   
2. **Credit Building**: Tools like Gauss’s Credit Builder help improve credit scores with minimal effort—some products even require no credit checks and feature monthly payments under $5.

3. **Rewards System**: By interacting with the app and making timely payments, users earn rewards points that can be used to offset fees, reduce APRs, or access premium services.

4. **Automated Payments**: Users can set up autopay for their credit cards to ensure bills are paid on time, avoiding late fees and interest.

5. **Personalized Plans**: The app can help users create tailored plans for debt repayment based on their financial circumstances.

As a tech company rather than a bank, Gauss positions itself as a helpful ally in managing credit card debt efficiently. It charges a small monthly subscription fee starting at $4.99, which can be canceled at any time. Gauss is particularly useful for those who struggle with multiple credit cards—making financial management less stressful and more intuitive.

In essence, if you’re dealing with the chaos of credit card debt and looking for a streamlined solution, Gauss offers a compelling approach that blends technology with personal finance. Check them out at [Gauss Money](https://gauss.money).
